vb4:49.3: Uppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya chandaṃ janeti, vāyamati, vīriyaṃ ārabhati, cittaṃ paggaṇhāti, padahati.
vb4:49.4: Anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya chandaṃ janeti, vāyamati, vīriyaṃ ārabhati, cittaṃ paggaṇhāti, padahati.

vb4:50.5: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
vb4:51.2: Idha bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi, vivicca akusalehi dhammehi, savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
vb4:51.3: Vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā, ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ, cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
vb4:51.4: Pītiyā ca virāgā, upekkhako ca viharati, sato ca sampajāno, sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedeti, yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti—“upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī”ti, tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
vb4:51.5: Sukhassa ca pahānā, dukkhassa ca pahānā, pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamā, adukkhamasukhaṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
vb4:56.2: Avasesā ca kilesā, avasesā ca akusalā dhammā, tīṇi ca kusalamūlāni sāsavāni, avasesā ca sāsavā kusalā dhammā, sāsavā ca kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipākā, ye ca dhammā kiriyā neva kusalā nākusalā na ca kammavipākā, sabbañca rūpaṃ—
vb4:58.2: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā, vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo hoti sammādiṭṭhi …pe… sammāsamādhi.
vb4:59.2: Yā paññā pajānanā …pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—
vb4:60.2: Yo takko vitakko …pe… sammāsaṅkappo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—
vb4:61.2: Yā catūhi vacīduccaritehi ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī akiriyā akaraṇaṃ anajjhāpatti velāanatikkamo setughāto sammāvācā maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—
vb4:62.2: Yā tīhi kāyaduccaritehi ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī akiriyā akaraṇaṃ anajjhāpatti velāanatikkamo setughāto sammākammanto maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—
vb4:63.2: Yā micchā ājīvā ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī akiriyā akaraṇaṃ anajjhāpatti velāanatikkamo setughāto sammāājīvo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—
vb4:64.2: Yo cetasiko vīriyārambho …pe… sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—
vb4:65.2: Yā sati anussati …pe… sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—
vb4:66.2: Yā cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti …pe… sammāsamādhi samādhisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—

vb4:82.2: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā, vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo hoti—
vb4:85.2: Avasesā ca kilesā, avasesā ca akusalā dhammā, tīṇi ca kusalamūlāni sāsavāni, avasesā ca sāsavā kusalā dhammā, sāsavā ca kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipākā, ye ca dhammā kiriyā neva kusalā nākusalā na ca kammavipākā, sabbañca rūpaṃ—
vb4:87.2: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā, vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye pañcaṅgiko maggo hoti—
vb4:88.2: Yā paññā pajānanā …pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—
vb4:89.2: Yo takko vitakko …pe… sammāsaṅkappo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—
vb4:90.2: Yo cetasiko vīriyārambho …pe… sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—
vb4:91.2: Yā sati anussati …pe… sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—
vb4:92.2: Yā cittassa ṭhiti …pe… sammāsamādhi samādhisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—
vb4:93.2: Taṇhā ca, avasesā ca kilesā, avasesā ca akusalā dhammā, tīṇi ca kusalamūlāni sāsavāni, avasesā ca sāsavā kusalā dhammā—
vb4:94.2: Sāsavā kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipākā, ye ca dhammā kiriyā neva kusalā nākusalā na ca kammavipākā, sabbañca rūpaṃ—
vb4:95.2: Taṇhāya ca, avasesānañca kilesānaṃ, avasesānañca akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ, tiṇṇañca kusalamūlānaṃ sāsavānaṃ, avasesānañca sāsavānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānaṃ—
vb4:96.2: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā, vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye pañcaṅgiko maggo hoti—
vb4:99.2: Avasesā ca kilesā, avasesā ca akusalā dhammā, tīṇi ca kusalamūlāni sāsavāni, avasesā ca sāsavā kusalā dhammā, sāsavā ca kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipākā, ye ca dhammā kiriyā neva kusalā nākusalā na ca kammavipākā, sabbañca rūpaṃ—
vb4:101.2: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti.
vb4:102.2: Taṇhā ca, avasesā ca kilesā, avasesā ca akusalā dhammā, tīṇi ca kusalamūlāni sāsavāni, avasesā ca sāsavā kusalā dhammā—
vb4:103.2: Sāsavā kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipākā, ye ca dhammā kiriyā neva kusalā nākusalā na ca kammavipākā, sabbañca rūpaṃ—
vb4:104.2: Taṇhāya ca, avasesānañca kilesānaṃ, avasesānañca akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ, tiṇṇañca kusalamūlānaṃ sāsavānaṃ, avasesānañca sāsavānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānaṃ—
vb4:105.2: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti.
vb4:107.2: dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ.
vb4:108.1: Catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ kati kusalā, kati akusalā, kati abyākatā …pe… kati saraṇā, kati araṇā?
vb4:109.4: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā kusalaṃ, siyā akusalaṃ, siyā abyākataṃ. (1)
vb4:110.1: Dve saccā siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā.
vb4:110.3: “sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttan”tipi, “dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttan”tipi, “adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttan”tipi.
vb4:110.4: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ, siyā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ, siyā na vattabbaṃ—“sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttan”tipi, “dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttan”tipi, “adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttan”tipi. (2)
vb4:111.3: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā vipākaṃ, siyā vipākadhammadhammaṃ, siyā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ. (3)
vb4:114.3: Maggasaccaṃ siyā savitakkasavicāraṃ, siyā avitakkavicāramattaṃ, siyā avitakkaavicāraṃ.
vb4:114.4: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā savitakkasavicāraṃ, siyā avitakkavicāramattaṃ, siyā avitakkaavicāraṃ, siyā na vattabbaṃ—“savitakkasavicāran”tipi, “avitakkavicāramattan”tipi, “avitakkaavicāran”tipi. (6)
vb4:115.1: Dve saccā siyā pītisahagatā, siyā sukhasahagatā, siyā upekkhāsahagatā.
vb4:115.4: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā pītisahagataṃ, siyā sukhasahagataṃ, siyā upekkhāsahagataṃ, siyā na vattabbaṃ—“pītisahagatan”tipi, “sukhasahagatan”tipi, “upekkhāsahagatan”tipi. (7)
vb4:116.1: Dve saccā neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbā.
vb4:116.2: Samudayasaccaṃ siyā dassanena pahātabbaṃ, siyā bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ.
vb4:116.3: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā dassanena pahātabbaṃ, siyā bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ, siyā neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ. (8)
vb4:117.1: Dve saccā neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā.
vb4:117.2: Samudayasaccaṃ siyā dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ, siyā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ.
vb4:117.3: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ, siyā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ, siyā neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ. (9)
vb4:121.3: Samudayasaccaṃ siyā parittārammaṇaṃ, siyā mahaggatārammaṇaṃ na appamāṇārammaṇaṃ, siyā na vattabbaṃ—“parittārammaṇan”tipi, “mahaggatārammaṇan”tipi.
vb4:121.4: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā parittārammaṇaṃ, siyā mahaggatārammaṇaṃ, siyā appamāṇārammaṇaṃ, siyā na vattabbaṃ—“parittārammaṇan”tipi, “mahaggatārammaṇan”tipi, “appamāṇārammaṇan”tipi. (13)
vb4:123.3: Dve saccā siyā micchattaniyatā, siyā aniyatā. (15)
vb4:124.4: Maggasaccaṃ na maggārammaṇaṃ maggahetukaṃ, siyā maggādhipati, siyā na vattabbaṃ—“maggādhipatī”ti.
vb4:124.5: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā maggārammaṇaṃ na maggahetukaṃ, siyā maggādhipati, siyā na vattabbaṃ—“maggārammaṇan”tipi, “maggādhipatī”tipi. (16)
vb4:125.1: Dve saccā siyā uppannā, siyā anuppannā, na vattabbā—
vb4:125.5: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā uppannaṃ, siyā anuppannaṃ, siyā uppādi. (17)
vb4:126.1: Tīṇi saccāni siyā atītā, siyā anāgatā, siyā paccuppannā.
vb4:127.4: Dve saccā siyā atītārammaṇā, siyā anāgatārammaṇā, siyā paccuppannārammaṇā, siyā na vattabbā—“atītārammaṇā”tipi, “anāgatārammaṇā”tipi, “paccuppannārammaṇā”tipi. (19)
vb4:128.2: Tīṇi saccāni siyā ajjhattā, siyā bahiddhā, siyā ajjhattabahiddhā. (20)
vb4:129.3: Samudayasaccaṃ siyā ajjhattārammaṇaṃ, siyā bahiddhārammaṇaṃ, siyā ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇaṃ.
vb4:129.4: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā ajjhattārammaṇaṃ, siyā bahiddhārammaṇaṃ, siyā ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇaṃ, siyā na vattabbaṃ—“ajjhattārammaṇan”tipi, “bahiddhārammaṇan”tipi, “ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇan”tipi. (21)
vb4:130.2: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā sanidassanasappaṭighaṃ, siyā anidassanasappaṭighaṃ, siyā anidassanaappaṭighaṃ. (22)
vb4:131.3: Dve saccā siyā hetū, siyā na hetū.
vb4:131.13: Maggasaccaṃ siyā hetu ceva sahetukañca, siyā sahetukañceva na ca hetu.
vb4:131.14: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā hetu ceva sahetukañca, siyā sahetukañceva na ca hetu, siyā na vattabbaṃ—“hetu ceva sahetukañcā”tipi, “sahetukañceva na ca hetū”tipi.
vb4:131.18: Maggasaccaṃ siyā hetu ceva hetusampayuttañca, siyā hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetu.
vb4:131.19: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā hetu ceva hetusampayuttañca, siyā hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetu, siyā na vattabbaṃ—“hetu ceva hetusampayuttañcā”tipi, “hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetū”tipi.
vb4:131.23: Maggasaccaṃ siyā na hetusahetukaṃ, siyā na vattabbaṃ—“na hetusahetukan”tipi, “na hetuahetukan”tipi.
vb4:131.24: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā na hetusahetukaṃ, siyā na hetuahetukaṃ, siyā na vattabbaṃ—“na hetusahetukan”tipi, “na hetuahetukan”tipi.
vb4:133.3: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā āsavo, siyā no āsavo.
vb4:133.11: “āsavā ceva sāsavā cā”tipi, “sāsavā ceva no ca āsavā”tipi.
vb4:133.12: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā āsavo ceva sāsavañca, siyā sāsavañceva no ca āsavo.
vb4:133.15: “āsavā ceva āsavasampayuttā cā”tipi, “āsavasampayuttā ceva no ca āsavā”tipi.
vb4:133.16: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā āsavo ceva āsavasampayuttañca, siyā āsavasampayuttañceva no ca āsavo, siyā na vattabbaṃ—“āsavo ceva āsavasampayuttañcā”tipi, “āsavasampayuttañceva no ca āsavo”tipi.
vb4:133.20: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā āsavavippayuttasāsavaṃ, siyā na vattabbaṃ—“āsavavippayuttasāsavan”tipi, “āsavavippayuttaanāsavan”tipi.
vb4:134.3: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā saṃyojanaṃ, siyā no saṃyojanaṃ.
vb4:134.11: “saṃyojanā ceva saṃyojaniyā cā”tipi, “saṃyojaniyā ceva no ca saṃyojanā”tipi.
vb4:134.12: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā saṃyojanañceva saṃyojaniyañca, siyā saṃyojaniyañceva no ca saṃyojanaṃ.
vb4:134.15: “saṃyojanā ceva saṃyojanasampayuttā cā”tipi, “saṃyojanasampayuttā ceva no ca saṃyojanā”tipi.
vb4:134.16: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā saṃyojanañceva saṃyojanasampayuttañca, siyā saṃyojanasampayuttañceva no ca saṃyojanaṃ, siyā na vattabbaṃ—“saṃyojanañceva saṃyojanasampayuttañcā”tipi, “saṃyojanasampayuttañceva no ca saṃyojanan”tipi.
vb4:135.3: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā gantho, siyā no gantho.
vb4:135.7: Dve saccā siyā ganthasampayuttā, siyā ganthavippayuttā.
vb4:135.10: “ganthā ceva ganthaniyā cā”tipi, “ganthaniyā ceva no ca ganthā”tipi.
vb4:135.11: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā gantho ceva ganthaniyañca, siyā ganthaniyañceva no ca gantho.
vb4:135.12: Samudayasaccaṃ gantho ceva ganthasampayuttañca, siyā na vattabbaṃ—“gantho ceva ganthasampayuttañcā”tipi, “ganthasampayuttañceva no ca gantho”tipi.
vb4:135.14: “ganthā ceva ganthasampayuttā cā”tipi, “ganthasampayuttā ceva no ca gantho”tipi.
vb4:135.15: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā gantho ceva ganthasampayuttañca, siyā ganthasampayuttañceva no ca gantho, siyā na vattabbaṃ—“gantho ceva ganthasampayuttañcā”tipi, “ganthasampayuttañceva no ca gantho”tipi.
vb4:135.17: Dve saccā siyā ganthavippayuttaganthaniyā, siyā na vattabbā—“ganthavippayuttaganthaniyā”tipi, “ganthavippayuttaaganthaniyā”tipi.
vb4:136.5: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā nīvaraṇaṃ, siyā no nīvaraṇaṃ.
vb4:136.6: Dve saccā nīvaraṇiyā dve saccā anīvaraṇiyā.
vb4:136.12: “nīvaraṇā ceva nīvaraṇiyā cā”tipi, “nīvaraṇiyā ceva no ca nīvaraṇā”tipi.
vb4:136.13: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā nīvaraṇañceva nīvaraṇiyañca, siyā nīvaraṇiyañceva no ca nīvaraṇaṃ.
vb4:136.16: “nīvaraṇā ceva nīvaraṇasampayuttā cā”tipi, “nīvaraṇasampayuttā ceva no ca nīvaraṇā”tipi.
vb4:136.17: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā nīvaraṇañceva nīvaraṇasampayuttañca, siyā nīvaraṇasampayuttañceva no ca nīvaraṇaṃ, siyā na vattabbaṃ—“nīvaraṇañceva nīvaraṇasampayuttañcā”tipi, “nīvaraṇasampayuttañceva no ca nīvaraṇan”tipi.
vb4:137.2: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā parāmāso, siyā no parāmāso.
vb4:137.7: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā parāmāsasampayuttaṃ, siyā parāmāsavippayuttaṃ, siyā na vattabbaṃ—“parāmāsasampayuttan”tipi, “parāmāsavippayuttan”tipi.
vb4:137.9: “parāmāso ceva parāmaṭṭhañcā”ti, parāmaṭṭhañceva no ca parāmāso.
vb4:137.11: “parāmāsā ceva parāmaṭṭhā cā”tipi, “parāmaṭṭhā ceva no ca parāmāsā”tipi.
vb4:137.12: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā parāmāso ceva parāmaṭṭhañca, siyā parāmaṭṭhañceva no ca parāmāso.
vb4:137.14: Dve saccā siyā parāmāsavippayuttaparāmaṭṭhā, siyā na vattabbā—“parāmāsavippayuttaparāmaṭṭhā”tipi, “parāmāsavippayuttaaparāmaṭṭhā”tipi.
vb4:138.5: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā cittaṃ, siyā no cittaṃ.
vb4:138.11: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā cittasampayuttaṃ, siyā cittavippayuttaṃ, siyā na vattabbaṃ—“cittena sampayuttan”tipi, “cittena vippayuttan”tipi.
vb4:138.14: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ, siyā cittavisaṃsaṭṭhaṃ, siyā na vattabbaṃ—“cittena saṃsaṭṭhan”tipi, “cittena visaṃsaṭṭhan”tipi.
vb4:138.17: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ, siyā no cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
vb4:138.20: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā cittasahabhū, siyā no cittasahabhū.
vb4:138.23: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā cittānuparivatti, siyā no cittānuparivatti.
vb4:138.26: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ, siyā no cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
vb4:138.29: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū, siyā no cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū.
vb4:138.32: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivatti, siyā no cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivatti.
vb4:139.4: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā upādā, siyā no upādā.
vb4:140.3: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā upādānaṃ, siyā no upādānaṃ.
vb4:140.7: Dve saccā siyā upādānasampayuttā, siyā upādānavippayuttā.
vb4:140.10: “upādānā ceva upādāniyā cā”tipi, “upādāniyā ceva no ca upādānā”tipi.
vb4:140.11: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā upādānañceva upādāniyañca, siyā upādāniyañceva no ca upādānaṃ.
vb4:140.12: Samudayasaccaṃ siyā upādānañceva upādānasampayuttañca, siyā na vattabbaṃ—“upādānañceva upādānasampayuttañcā”tipi, “upādānasampayuttañceva no ca upādānan”tipi.
vb4:140.14: “upādānā ceva upādānasampayuttā cā”tipi, “upādānasampayuttā ceva no ca upādānā”tipi.
vb4:140.15: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā upādānañceva upādānasampayuttañca, siyā upādānasampayuttañceva no ca upādānaṃ, siyā na vattabbaṃ—“upādānañceva upādānasampayuttañcā”tipi, “upādānasampayuttañceva no ca upādānan”tipi.
vb4:140.17: Dve saccā siyā upādānavippayuttaupādāniyā, siyā na vattabbā—“upādānavippayuttaupādāniyā”tipi, “upādānavippayuttaanupādāniyā”tipi.
vb4:141.3: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā kileso, siyā no kileso.
vb4:141.14: “kilesā ceva saṃkilesikā cā”tipi, “saṃkilesikā ceva no ca kilesā”tipi.
vb4:141.15: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā kileso ceva saṃkilesikañca, siyā saṃkilesikañceva no ca kileso.
vb4:141.18: “kilesā ceva saṃkiliṭṭhā cā”tipi, “saṃkiliṭṭhā ceva no ca kilesā”tipi.
vb4:141.19: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā kileso ceva saṃkiliṭṭhañca, siyā saṃkiliṭṭhañceva no ca kileso, siyā na vattabbaṃ—“kileso ceva saṃkiliṭṭhañcā”tipi, “saṃkiliṭṭhañceva no ca kileso”tipi.
vb4:141.22: “kilesā ceva kilesasampayuttā cā”tipi, “kilesasampayuttā ceva no ca kilesā”tipi.
vb4:141.23: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā kileso ceva kilesasampayuttañca, siyā kilesasampayuttañceva no ca kileso, siyā na vattabbaṃ—“kileso ceva kilesasampayuttañcā”tipi, “kilesasampayuttañceva no ca kileso”tipi.
vb4:142.2: Dve saccā siyā dassanena pahātabbā, siyā na dassanena pahātabbā.
vb4:142.4: Dve saccā siyā bhāvanāya pahātabbā, siyā na bhāvanāya pahātabbā.
vb4:142.6: Dve saccā siyā dassanena pahātabbahetukā, siyā na dassanena pahātabbahetukā.
vb4:142.8: Dve saccā siyā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā, siyā na bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā.
vb4:142.11: Dve saccā siyā savitakkā, siyā avitakkā.
vb4:142.14: Dve saccā siyā savicārā, siyā avicārā.
vb4:142.16: Tīṇi saccāni siyā sappītikā, siyā appītikā.
vb4:142.18: Tīṇi saccāni siyā pītisahagatā, siyā na pītisahagatā.
vb4:142.20: Tīṇi saccāni siyā sukhasahagatā, siyā na sukhasahagatā.
vb4:142.22: Tīṇi saccāni siyā upekkhāsahagatā, siyā na upekkhāsahagatā.
vb4:143.3: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā kāmāvacaraṃ, siyā na kāmāvacaraṃ.
vb4:143.5: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā rūpāvacaraṃ, siyā na rūpāvacaraṃ.
vb4:143.7: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā arūpāvacaraṃ, siyā na arūpāvacaraṃ.
vb4:143.14: Dve saccā siyā niyatā, siyā aniyatā.
